citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00 on
04-Oct-16.
Knocked on door, honked, walked out towards kennel and yelled, tried calling mobile but lost connection each time.
